{{ message }}

import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-error-message', templateUrl: './error-message.component.html', styleUrls: ['./error-message.component.scss'], }) export class ErrorMessageComponent implements OnInit { @Input() visible: boolean = true; @Input() message: string = ''; constructor() {} ngOnInit(): void {} }
